reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have owned nearly every kind of LG around the neck headphones available. I usually replace them every 1.5 years. I thought I would try these for a change. I'm blown away! The sound quality is amazing, better than LG. Actually they sound better than my Sony WH1000XM5 headphones. Double tapping the play button allows you to change the sound profile. With the bass profile, the bass is deep, clean, and the highs are clear. They connect seamlessly and were easy to pair. The auto call answer feature works great and calls are clear on both ends. You can also use audio transparency to hear your surroundings. The only thing I would improve works be the volume/skip button, it is a slider button. If these last at least a year I will be buying them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great neckband style headphone
reviews.reviewText: I am surprised at the quality of this product. I like neckband style headphones because I do not like the feel of any earbuds in my ears all day. They become uncomfortable. The neckband style is comfortable. I have used this style of headphones for quite some time but my previous brand doesn't seem to be making new models anymore. I needed to find a new brand. This Exfit has all the features I wanted including retractable earbuds, noise cancelling, vibrates when a call comes in, built in microphone for phone calls plus its water resistant. It has good sound for listening as well as what my callers hear. With other brands, my callers would often say I sounded muffled. But, with this one, the callers say I sound clear and they can hear me perfectly. This is a great unit. I can't really comment yet on battery life but it seems like I will need to charge it every day or two. (I do not listen to music all day and average very few phone calls.) I also cannot comment yet on durability but it seems at least as well made as my other brand that I used to use which was at least 3x the price. Quality seems sturdy and well made but time will tell. This is my new "go to" brand for neckband headphones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Back ground nose
reviews.reviewText: I have Purchase these headphones several times And each pair has performed differently but the one thing they all had in common was the structure of these headphones and the mechanical parts of these headphones starts to crumble after some time With that being said before any of that happens they are a great Pair of headphones to have the one thing I love about these headphones is they're lightweight and not bulky and your music sounds great now the Issue I'm having with this pair is I'm having to repeat myself and other people who I recommended these headphones to says the same thing when speaking your voice isn't clear and this pair I just purchase people who I talk to are complaining about the background noise in the pass I have brought the blue ones and I didn't have that issue so I don't know if the technology in the blue one's is different from the technology in the black one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and affordable!
reviews.reviewText: I work in a medical imaging dept at a hospital. I need to be available to communicate quickly with physicians, RN's & other coworkers throughout the day. I have used various Bluetooth headsets for about 10yrs. This is my 2nd pair from this brand. The 1st headset I've had for about 3 yrs, and just ordered this one as a backup and to share with my wife. Once the initial phone pairing is done, reconnecting with the phone's Bluetooth is super fast. -Around 3 seconds after turning on the headset's power. Answering a call, is done by pulling out one of the retractable earpieces. The headset stays put throughout the day. It is lightweight, flexible and very comfortable. You will forget they're on your neck. Hearing and talking are both crystal clear. I have found battery life to be excellent. I have the headset on for 8-10 hrs, 5 days a week. Though my total daily talk-time is probably only 1-2hrs. I never run out of a charge. But because the headset is so important to my work, I recharge it about once every 7-10 days. I would definitely buy these again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unstable blutooth connection and Frequent Microphone Dropout
reviews.reviewText: Nice earphones except frequent bluetooth disconnection making calls switch between my earphone and my car. Additionally, frequently people on the other end say the microphone is not picking up my voice and my audio is dropping out. I often have to go to speaker mode on my iPhone since I can't be heard. These do have great microphone noise cancellation when they are working. I can take a call in a concert, and the people on the other end can't tell I am not in a quiet room. Battery life is excellent and lasts longer than advertised. Audio quality for music listening is very good!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for pairing to mobile phones, I carry 2 cellular phones, iPhone and galaxy, connects to both simultaneously and will respond directly to active calls even while on the other doing business. Satisfied great choices

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this “pro“ version of this headset because they were sold out of the original one. I had the original one and used it for a couple of years before I finally wore it out and it worked great. Got online to replace it and they were sold out. Pro model available for a little extra money. I thought “well I was fine with the normal one so I’ll just step it up a notch.” Literally the worst money I have ever spent as an adult. Terrible, terrible item. Nobody could hear me through the microphone and it would spend more time disconnecting and reconnecting via Bluetooth than anything else. After fighting with it for four or five months it finally enraged me enough that I tore it off my neck, broke it into four pieces and threw it out the window driving down the highway. Never again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been looking forward to this review for a long time actually. I've bought many! of the LG like this. this is my absolute favorite!! they sound amazing! they're very much more sturdy than the LG. Although if you sleep with them in your bed they will break. 🤣extremely 100'% satisfied!! and will be buying them again because I slept with mine 🤣I love music and I love audio, these particular ones are fantastic!! 😎

I was hesitant to try this type of ear phones thinking the retractable ear buds would fail. But they haven’t! I wear these every work day on building sites and they are great.- Noise cancelling is fantastic, I use them instead of ear muffs.- Sound quality is good. Better than a radio blasting in a building site.- Battery life lasts all day.- Electronic noise cancelling is good for shooting sports too.
Good quality, good sound. Terrible noise cancellation, would not recommend for for phone calls while in a vehicle or anywhere with background noise
